TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CustomTypeDescriptor extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor
Public MustInherit Class CustomTypeDescriptor Implements ICustomTypeDescriptor

summary.span: 提供 接口的简单默认实现。

span.span: Provides a simple default implementation of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与类似 , 类依赖于构造期间提供的类型的父对象。Like , the class relies on a parent object of type supplied during construction. 这允许派生自的类有选择地重写方法。This allows classes that derive from to selectively override methods.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数等效于使用参数 ( 为`null`) 调用另一个构造函数。This constructor is equivalent to calling the other constructor with a parameter that is `null`. 使用此构造函数创建的的所有方法都将返回默认值。All methods of a created with this constructor will return default values.

summary.span: 使用父级自定义类型说明符初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using a parent custom type descriptor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果参数为`null`, 则所有方法都将返回默认值。 `parent`If the `parent` parameter is `null`, all methods will return default values. 否则, 所有方法都将委托给的`parent`方法。Otherwise, all methods will delegate to the methods of `parent`. 大多数方法默认`null`情况下返回。Most methods return `null` by default. 下表显示了默认情况下不返回`null`的方法的返回值。The following table shows the return values for the methods that do not return `null` by default. |方法Method|默认返回值Default return value| |------------|--------------------------| ||空特性集合 ()。An empty attribute collection ().| ||默认实例。The default instance.| ||空事件集合 ()。An empty events collection ().| ||空属性集合 ()。An empty property collection ().|
